description: In an uncharacteristically charitable move, EA has just made the source code for four of its legacy Command & Conquer titles freely available to the public under the GPL license. This includes the restored original source code for both Command & Conquer and Red Alert, as well as the SAGE-powered Command & Conquer: Renegade and Command & Conquer: Generals. While fan proje
title: Four classic Command & Conquer titles are now open source

description: I’ve said it before: Nintendo’s WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Microgames! for Game Boy Advance is one of the all-time greats. The 2003 minigame compilation is an absurdist deconstruction of gaming itself, and an irreverent, scattershot creation that stands as perhaps the most punk-rock thing Nintendo has ever done. But while the masterpiece prefigured everything from the 2000s casual gaming boom to the coming mobile gaming revolution, it’s seldom been imitated, except by its own (
title: Mindwave builds thrillingly on a Nintendo masterpiece

description:
If you’re anything like me, the first extended look we got at Pokémon Legends: Z-A on Feb. 27 had you scouring every frame of footage for signs of your favorite pocket monsters. We’ve gone ahead and saved you some work by collecting the names of the Pokémon we were able to find in the game’s assets so far.

The list below includes all the Pokémon explicitly shown to exist in Pokémon Legends: Z-A — as well as every other Pokémon in their evolutionary lines — i
title: Every Pokémon confirmed for Pokémon Legends: Z-A

description:
We’re getting a new video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day in 2025, and it may be the most authentic, perfectly pitched movie-to-game adaptation I’ve ever seen. Terminator 2: No Fate is a 2D side-scrolling action game that looks like it was conceived in 1991 for the arcade tech of the time, with the intent of expertly adapting the film’s most memorable set pieces.

Developer Bitmap Bureau is going beyond what was in the film (as arcade and console video game adaptations of movies did at the time) by adding in deleted and
title: This is what a new Terminator game should actually look like

description: Like her Gotham City counterpart Batman, Wonder Woman leapt into DC Comics’ blockbuster Absolute line — a starting-from-scratch setting where the odds stacked against DC’s classic superheroes are higher than ever — with a striking new look. Astride a red-eyed skeletal pegasus, Diana sports tattooed arms, a buster sword, a black-and-red color scheme, and (perhaps most controversially) pants.
title: Why Absolute Wonder Woman’s creators rewrote her as a literal witch from hell

description:
Monsters in Monster Hunter Now are, as with every entry in the series, the main focus of the game, giving you new challenges to face and weapon and armor types to craft.

Starting with just a handful of large monsters to begin with, the further you progress through the main story quest, the more species you unlock.

For those who prefer to discover these at their own pace, the following page contains spoilers for the monster list in Monster Hunter Now — including whether ther
title: Monster Hunter Now monster list

description:
Nintendo is one of The Pokémon Company’s three stakeholders. The link between Pokémon and Nintendo consoles is ironclad and decades-long, and Pokémon is probably one of the two biggest brands on those consoles, alongside Mario. So why did the Pokémon Presents livestream on this fair Pokémon Day go without a single mention of Nintendo’s now officially announced next console, the Switch 2?

It isn’t as if Nintendo and Th
title: Pokémon Champions and Z-A will obviously be on Switch 2, so why not say so?

description: Deus Ex: Human Revolution was the first immersive sim that really clicked for me. The freedom to go loud or stealthy, to navigate the meticulously-crafted levels via the conveniently human-size air ducts, or to hack my way to success, and of course, the likable edgelo
title: Deus Ex: Human Revolution is a must-play immersive sim, and it’s free right now

description:
Rush of Ikorr, a new trading card game from Upper Deck, broke cover on Wednesday with a news release. In a private briefing ahead of the announcement, director of entertainment brands Travis Rhea tells Polygon that the game, which is designed around a novel 3v3 multiplayer format, was inspired by the company’s work with video game brands as well as the hit hero shooter Overwatch. 

“[Upper Deck] was founded in 1989 on the premise of How do we make a better baseball card?” Rhea said. “That premise of how do we do something bett
title: Rush of Ikorr brings Overwatch-inspired mechanics to a novel 3v3 card game

description:
We’ve known about Shrek 5 being a thing officially since last year (and unofficially for longer than that). But we finally get a first glimpse of the new Shrek, and whoa, my mind’s a little broken at the implications.

The teaser is just over 30 seconds long, but it involves Shrek looking at a bunch of Shrek memes via t
title: Shrek memes are canon in the new Shrek

description:
Out of all the categories at the Academy Awards, Best Animated Feature has historically been one of the most predictable.

For nearly 20 years, it was basically a guarantee that if a Pixar movie was up for the award, it would win. However, over the past five years, that dynamic has shifted, with an increasing number of internationa
title: This year’s race for the Best Animated Feature Oscar changes the whole game

description:
From Feb. 27 to April 30, Pokémon TCG Pocket players can log in and get three three free Genetic Apex booster packs that guarantee at least one rare card.

The months-long giveaway is in celebration of a big Pokémon Day milestone — 100 million downloads across iOS and Android. That’s a 40 million increase in players since the last update of 60 million downloads in December. Pokémon
title: Pokémon TCG Pocket giving away free booster packs to mark Pokémon Day milestone

description: Lazarus, the upcoming sci-fi action anime from Cowboy Bebop creator Shinichirō Watanabe, finally has a premiere date. On Thursday, Adult Swim released a new trailer announcing that the latest original series from the celebrated anime auteur will premiere at midnight on April 5 on Adult Swim and be
title: Cowboy Bebop creator Shinichirō Watanabe’s new anime Lazarus is finally upon us

description:
With Pokémon X and Pokémon Y came Mega Evolutions — a battle mechanic that temporarily boosts a Pokémon’s power in different ways. It hasn’t been a feature in Pokémon games for a couple generations, but Mega Evolutions will indeed return in 2025 with Pokémon Legends: Z-A, The Pokémon Company confirmed during its Pokémon Presents broadcast on Thursday.

There’s still a lot unknown about Pokémon Legends: Z-A, but Mega Evolutions should work similar to how they have in previous games. Pokémon must hold a Mega Stone, and trainers need a Key Sto
title: What we know about Pokémon Legends: Z-A’s Mega Evolutions

description: There’s a long history of games using… let’s say creative solutions to get around licensing problems. This is especially true in sports games: Baseball video games long had to figure out alternatives to superstar Barry Bonds, who famously refused to license his name and likeness for games. (It’s the same for football games and coach Bill Belichick.) College sports games stopped entirely be
title: The Executive’s spoonerisms bring silly joy to a fun movie-studio sim

description:
Triumphant Light is an upcoming expansion for Pokémon TCG Pocket. This themed booster pack will build off the Space-Time Smackdown expansion and add new cards, including special cards with a new battle gimmick called Link Abilities.

Triumphant Light focuse
title: When does the Triumphant Light expansion release in Pokémon TCG Pocket?

description:
The seventh annual Zine Quest, Kickstarter’s annual festival of short-form tabletop games, is nearing the end of its launch window with any remaining campaigns set to go live before the end of February. And while funding for these projects will continue throughout March — and beyond, thanks to the platform’s newly introduced late-pledge service — we already have an idea of what the most popular campaigns are. 

Here’s a quick
title: Zine Quest’s top projects includes a little something for goth horse girls

description: It’s Pokémon Day, aka the anniversary of the day the first Pokémon game was released! The Pokémon Company has taken the opportunity to announce several exciting updates as part of its 2025 Pokémon Presents livestream on Thursday, including a surprise cross-platform battle game called Pokémon Champions and the return of Mega Evolutions, a fan favorite mechanic. Plus, we’ll have a new season of
title: All the 2025 Pokémon Day news: a surprise battle game, Mega Evolutions, and more

description: The PlayStation VR 2 headset for PlayStation 5 and Windows PC is no stranger to getting a temporary $200 price drop during the holidays, but now it’s permanent. Sony announced Thursday that both the $549.99 standalone kit as well as the $599.99 bundle that includes Horizon: Call of the Mountain (a PSVR2 launch title) will sell for the same $399.99 price. No exact date for
title: PlayStation VR 2 will be up to $200 cheaper starting in March

description:
The developers behind the Metro franchise — Metro 2033, Last Light, and Exodus — will no longer be known as 4A Games Ukraine. You can call them Reburn now, a rebranding that arrives alongside the reveal of the Ukrainian team’s new story-driven sci-fi shooter La Quimera. The developer’s new game is available to wishlist on Steam, but does not have release date.

Reburn is trading the post-nuclear desolation of the Mo
title: Metro series devs have a new name and a new game, La Quimera

description:
With so many games available at our fingertips — or in our backlogs — it’s sometimes hard to know what game is worth our time. Figuring out where to spend our precious free time can feel daunting, especially with more things vying for our attention. And if you’re busy with jobs, family, or other obligations, that free time shrinks even more.

But Polygon is here to help. Well, actually, this week I’m here to help. During our weekly open thread, everyone is welcome to comment to ask for tailored game recommendations. Want a long game to tuck into during the winter? Or some way to test out a new genre you
title: Not sure what game to play next? Leave a comment, we’ll help

description:
It’s Pokémon Day 2025, and that means a new Pokémon Presents, which was full of reveals and updates on all things Pokémon — including our first real look at Pokémon Legends: Z-A, a new Pokémon multiplayer game, and more.

As usual, there were lots of smaller announcements and updates to The Pokémon Company’s live-service games like Pokémon TCG Pocket, Pokémon Unite, and Pokémon Sleep, alongside news about other adaptations of the franchise.

Don’t wo
title: Everything announced at Pokémon Presents 2025

description:
The Pokémon Company debuted its next Pokémon Legends: Z-A trailer during its Pokémon Day broadcast on Thursday, its first big update on the game since it was revealed during last year’s event.

As the name suggests, Pokémon Legends: Z-A is an expansion of the Pokémon Legends series, which began in 2022 with the launch of Pokémon Legends: Arceus — a spinoff game set in a far past version of the Sinnoh region. Pokémon Legends: Z-A, on the other hand, looks to be a future v
title: Here’s the next look at Pokémon Legends: Z-A — and its Mega Evolutions

description:
Everyone expected The Pokémon Company’s big Pokémon Day announcement to be an extended look at the upcoming Pokémon Legends: Z-A, but the company had a surprise: A new multiplayer Pokémon game called Pokémon Champions, a collaboration between Game Freak and The Pokémon Works.

Pokémon Champions will be on “the Nintendo Switch family of systems” and mobile. The game connects with Pokémon Home, so Pokémon can be transferred from Pokémon Go and other Pokémon games. There’s no information yet about the
title: Pokémon Champions battle game announced

description:
The second season of Pokémon Concierge is coming in September 2025, The Pokémon Company and Netflix announced Thursday during a Pokémon Presents livestream. The stop-motion animated series from Dwarf Studios will follow the continuing adventures of Pokémon resort concierge Haru.

Fans can expect new Pokémon to show up at the resort. The Pokémon Company teased the arrival of Sh
title: Pokémon Concierge returns to Netflix in 2025

description:
More new cards are coming to Pokémon TCG Pocket via the Triumphant Light booster pack, The Pokémon Company announced Thursday during its Pokémon Day broadcast.

As is customary for big events, however, the news leaked a bit early — reportedly after an ad for the game showing the new content was pushed live ahead of the announcement. The Tr
title: Pokémon TCG Pocket getting Arceus booster pack, Mega Evolutions

description: For large swaths of its playtime, Citizen Sleeper 2 is more or less a book. Dice rolls or no, you spend the bulk of your time in-game reading. For me, that rules, especially because developer Gareth Damian Martin is, for my money, one of the best writers in games right now. I love their evocative exposition, describing not just the physicality of a fully imagined cityspace, but the ways in which it plays on the minds of those who inhabit it. The story explores questions of migrancy, liminality, and scarcity with finesse. The writing is so strong, in fact, that a question occurred to me: Why isn’t this a novel instead of
title: Citizen Sleeper 2 is a great book that’s better because it’s a game

description:
Pokémon Go’s big Go Tour: Unova event takes place this weekend over the span of two days. If you’re worried about missing out on the powerful addition of Black and White Kyurem or just looking to know how to schedule your weekend, we got your back.

Below we explain what time Go Tour: Unova starts, along with an explanation on the other perks that exist outside of the event schedule.

What time does Go Tour: Unova start and end?
title: What time does Pokémon Go’s Go Tour Unova start and end?
